underground_canal_junction.title: Underground Canal Junction
underground_canal_junction.text:
The glowing canal opens into a junction where several waterways converge. Ancient carved symbols mark passages leading in different directions, while bioluminescent organisms provide gentle illumination throughout the network.

This seems to be a major transit hub for the underground systems, with currents flowing toward different parts of the archipelago.

choices.text: Follow the canal toward the Root Assembly territories.
Take the passage that leads toward the surface docks.
Explore the passage marked with crystal symbols.
